Description: Case of rectangular wooden inner-coffin of Gua; recessed and coloured Hieroglyphic text and eye-panel on exterior; painted Hieroglyphic text on interior.
Curator's comments: Published: PM IV: p.187 Harco Willems Chests of life, 1988, [cat no. B1L]. Nicholson and Shaw, Ancient Egyptian Materials and Technology (Cambridge 2000), p. 350
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
